Articles.Content:
There is an obscure game on the app store called 'Train Driver 15'. Now I know that this is kinda an advertisement, but as the rules say, 'excluding not-for-profit or optional donation sites'. First, does anyone play Train Driver 15? And second, would anyone check out the wiki I started for it? http://train-driver-15.wikia.com/wiki/Train_Driver_15_Wiki 

It would be helpful if anyone would actually visit the site. It isn't completely finished, as I started it yesterday, but I have made a few articles. Feedback is appreciated.
I don't play this game, but i remember using a PC simulator called Train Simulater 20yadeyadeyade it was quite fun. Vehicle simulators are fun!
